name: 蕾伊·道恩·钟 Rae Dawn Chong
intro: Rae Dawn Chong (born February 28, 1961) is a Canadian actress. She is best known for her roles in the films Quest for Fire (1981), Beat Street (1984), The Color Purple (1985), Commando (1985) and Time Runner (1993). She is the daughter of comedian and actor Tommy Chong.
birthplace: 加拿大,阿尔伯塔省,埃德蒙顿
